title: Veronica Mars S01-03 720p/900p
description:
Veronica Mars, the original TV series (2004-2007) S01-02 900p, S03 720p

Show Summary
============
In the wealthy, seaside community of Neptune, California, the rich and powerful make the rules. Unfortunately for them, there's Veronica Mars, a smart, fearless 17-year-old apprentice private investigator. During the day, Veronica must negotiate high school like any average teenage girl. But at night, she helps with her father's struggling private investigator business.

Uploader notes
==============
I take no credit for the original files I used. I downloaded the original files from reliant1. The reason I am reuploading them is because I converted the episodes to MP4, compressed them to about half their original size, compiled all 3 seasons into 1 torrent, and organized it all to be in compliance with Plex Media Server's naming.

As per the original torrents, Seasons 1 and 2 are 900p (1600x900), and season 3 is 720p. All episodes of all 3 seasons are present in this torrent, including the pilot episode of season 1. The season 4 pilot was not included, nor the Veronica Mars movie, nor any subtitles. The footage itself was not clipped, adjusted or modified in any way.

Also there are some commercials that are really loud at the end of most episodes, and some of the episodes may mess up with the audio sync, and there may be static that disrupts the quality of a few episodes. So because of all this, I recommend using VLC to watch this series so you can adjust the settings to play the videos at least partially like it was meant to be played. If I ever feel like reuploading with those imperfections fixed, I will comment the link to the new torrent down below. Or if someone else fixes it before me, please comment the link to it so everyone else, including myself, can enjoy the patched version. Thanks. (Links to SD versions don't count, I want HD.)

Credits
=======
Original files were uploaded by reliant1.
Files were converted, compressed, compiled and organized by gamewin1.

Season 1: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6306711/Veronica_Mars_-_Season_1_Complete._HDTV%28upn%29_x264_900p

Season 2: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6205721/Veronica_Mars_-_Season_2_Complete._HDTV%28upn%29_x264_900p_

Season 3: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5843434/Veronica_Mars_-_Season_3_Complete._HDTV_720p_x264

Compression Settings
====================
I'll share the compression settings I used with you guys. (I'm no genius when it comes to video editing or anything, I just wanted to get the ridiculously massive size of this TV series down a good bit.)
The program I used was Handbrake.
* Started with High Profile.
* Set the cropping to custom and lowered all 4 of the values to 0. (it would try to crop a few pixels at a time randomly across all the different episodes)
* Video tab, set Constant Quality to 23, set x264 tune to Film
* Chapters tab, unchecked Create chapter markers
